maxResults.description: Maximum number of memory chunks to inject

maxContextChars.description: Maximum total characters of injected context

timeoutMs.description: Timeout for memory search in milliseconds

logInjections.description: Log when memories are injected into prompts

skipShortPrompts.description: Skip prompts shorter than this many characters

cacheSize.description: Max entries in the prompt dedup LRU cache

cacheTtlMs.description: Time-to-live for cached prompt results in milliseconds (default 5 min)

adaptiveResults.description: Vary result count based on score quality (high score = fewer results, low score = none)

halfLifeHours.description: Temporal decay half-life in hours. Recent memories score higher. Set 0 to disable.

skipPatterns.description: Custom regex patterns (strings) for prompts to skip. Null uses built-in defaults.

enableSkipPatterns.description: Enable intent-gating skip patterns (creative, procedural, meta prompts)

enableTemporalParsing.description: Parse temporal expressions (yesterday, last week) from prompts

enableFeedbackLoop.description: Enable agent_end feedback hook for utility score tracking

enableMmr.description: Enable MMR diversity filtering to remove redundant memories

fuzzyCacheThreshold.description: Jaccard similarity threshold for fuzzy cache matching (0-1). Set 1.0 for exact-only.
